compliant.section:
如何透過 Google Chrome 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647?hl=zh-CN
如何透過 Microsoft Internet Explorer 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/278835/how-to-delete-cookie-files-in-internet-explorer
如何透過 Mozilla Firefox 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/delete-cookies-remove-info-websites-stored
如何透過 Apple Safari 瀏覽器控制您的Cookie設定：
https://support.apple.com/guide/safari/manage-cookies-and-website-data-sfri11471/mac
compliant.legal provisions: Providing users with clear and concise information on how to control their cookie settings aligns with the GDPR's principles of transparency and user control (Articles 12 and 13).
